__e: We will go to the peasants, and make friendly with them.
For once I meet a nice guy, not a redneck, and I can't talk to him!
From tomorrow, you are appointed judge... between soldier and peasant for all cases.
I know a peasant family who lives here.
Most of them are peasants who have never even seen a gun.
Yes, go south and lose your life among peasants who don't even know your name.
They are good people... but most of them... don't even speak Spanish.
Then, what you said in front of villagers... was just...
Damn sodbusters can't ever be too dead to suit me.
If you weren't involved in this, I'm sure they couldn't possibly do anything.
But I can tell you, around here most farmers don't know what cinema is.
The farmers are not prepared to cut down the bandits.
